name: Naveen Kumar 0001
content: Prof. Naveen Kumar, Professor ,Department of Computer Science, University of Delhi Naveen Kumar Senior Professor Department of Computer Science University of Delhi Naveen Kumar Senior Professor, Department of Computer Science, University of Delhi Biography Naveen Kumar is a Senior Professor at the Department of Computer Science, University of Delhi, Delhi, India. He holds a Ph.D. degree in Computer Science from IIT, Delhi. Before his doctoral studies, he earned his M.Tech. (Computer Science) and M.Sc. (Mathematics) degrees from IIT Delhi and an honours degree in Mathematics from the University of Delhi. He has taught undergraduate and postgraduate students various courses and has about 40 years of teaching experience. He has co-authored a book with Sheetal Taneja titled Python Programming, A Modular Approach, published by Pearson Education. He has supervised many PhD students in soft computing and social networks. His current areas of interest include explainable AI, machine learning, and deep learning. He has contributed several articles in national and international journals and conferences. He has been a member of the curriculum design committees of various universities and the CBSE. He has also been an organising chair/program committee member of several workshops, conferences, and symposia. Academic Qualifications Ph.D. Computer Science* Indian Institute of Technology, Delhi *Thesis title: Invariance in Computer Vision MTech. Computer science Indian Institute of Technology, Delhi M. Sc.
